answers.answer: I don't think it would have any effect on it. the glucose test is just to measure how well your body handles sugar to determine if you're susceptible to gestational diabetes or not.

question: so I got my glucose test on the 30th of this month and my doctor wants me to get my flu jab at the end of this month to. Could it affect my glucose test if I have it done before or should I wait and have it at the beginning of next month?
title: flu shot before or after glucose test
